com.firebase.authwrapper.providers.types

Interface IProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FacebookProvider, GoogleProvider, MailProvider, NullProvider, Provider

    public interface IProvider
    This class is an interface which exposed to the end user by the implemented provider delegate object. The delegate provider object encapsulates the concrete provider.
    Since:
    10-5-2018
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    ron barnoy
    See Also:
    Provider
